ModMetaData.name: Deathrest Unbound
ModMetaData.author: MsKarMagick
ModMetaData.description:
This mod removes the permanent binding mechanic from Deathrest Caskets, allowing pawns to use them even if they were previously used by a different pawn. No more having 10 different deathrest areas, or rebuilding a casket every time someone needs to use it.
Features: - Lets players manually unbind pawns from Deathrest Caskets.
Compatibility: - Tested on RimWorld version 1.5. - Compatible with Vanilla Sanguophages Expanded as it doesn't edit the base
Incompatibilities: - Other mods that do the same. If you find one that does? It probably does it better than this, use that instead. But I couldn't find any mod like this, hence why I'm publishing my first mod.
Load Order: - Ensure this mod is loaded after Biotech Harmony.
Special Thanks: - To the modders who've documented their work to make it easier on new modders. - Harmony devs for making this way easier than it otherwise would have been, and honestly just possible, period. - ChatGPT for enduring the onslaught of verbal abuse I sent its way while forcing it to try to remember things I sent 1500 messages ago.
